title: Names; registration of person required
context: [ยง373L-1.5 Names; registration of person required.] No person within the purview of this chapter shall use the terms &ldquo;professional employer organization&rdquo;, or &ldquo;PEO&rdquo;, or other similar name unless the person is registered and in compliance with this chapter and the rules adopted pursuant to this chapter. [L 2013, c 174, pt of ยง2]
